columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the resource.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state, which only appears in the response. Possible values include: 'InProgress', 'Failed', 'Succeeded', 'Canceled', 'Deleting'.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the resource.

columns.name: cluster_hdp_version
columns.description: The hdp version of the cluster.

columns.name: cluster_id
columns.description: The cluster id.

columns.name: cluster_state
columns.description: The state of the cluster.

columns.name: cluster_version
columns.description: The version of the cluster.

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: The date on which the cluster was created.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: The ETag for the resource.

columns.name: min_supported_tls_version
columns.description: The minimal supported tls version of the cluster.

columns.name: os_type
columns.description: The type of operating system. Possible values include: 'Windows', 'Linux'.

columns.name: tier
columns.description: The cluster tier. Possible values include: 'Standard', 'Premium'.

columns.name: cluster_definition
columns.description: The cluster definition.

columns.name: compute_isolation_properties
columns.description: The compute isolation properties of the cluster.

columns.name: compute_profile
columns.description: The complete profile of the cluster.

columns.name: connectivity_endpoints
columns.description: The list of connectivity endpoints.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the cluster.

columns.name: disk_encryption_properties
columns.description: The disk encryption properties of the cluster.

columns.name: encryption_in_transit_properties
columns.description: The encryption-in-transit properties of the cluster.

columns.name: errors
columns.description: The list of errors.

columns.name: excluded_services_config
columns.description: The excluded services config of the cluster.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity of the cluster, if configured.

columns.name: kafka_rest_properties
columns.description: The cluster kafka rest proxy configuration.

columns.name: network_properties
columns.description: The network properties of the cluster.

columns.name: quota_info
columns.description: The quota information of the cluster.

columns.name: security_profile
columns.description: The security profile of the cluster.

columns.name: storage_profile
columns.description: The storage profile of the cluster.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
